method.name: Simulated Annealing using Mutual Information measure

reference.ref: H. Liu and L. Yu. "Toward Integrating Feature Selection Algorithms for Classification and Clustering", IEEE Trans. onKnowledge and Data Engineering,17(4), 491-502, 2005.
H. Liu y H. Motoda, Feature Selection for Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1998.

generalDescription.objective: Feature Selection. This method allows search to follow feature subsets that are randomly generated
generalDescription.howWork: Simulated Annealing method starts from a randomly generated solution and moves to neighbor solutions. This movement can reach worse solutions than the previous one according to a probability that decreases over time. The cooling scheme used is Cauchy's.

parameterSpec.param: neighbors: number of neighbors generated per cooldown.
